short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A safe space for those who want to make America great again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alt-Space is a chrome extension designed to protect certain types of people from encountering real issues online that they might rather ignore.
